item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. GPT-fabricated scientific papers on Google Scholar (44 points | 22 comments)
2. WebP: The WebPage Compression Format (303 points | 115 comments)
3. Cracking an old ZIP file to help open source the ANC's "Vula" secret crypto code (108 points | 11 comments)
4. Gnome Files: A detailed UI examination (72 points | 15 comments)
5. Pick Your Distributed Poison (32 points | 3 comments)
6. A new rare high-rank elliptic curve, and an orchard of Diophantine equations (133 points | 9 comments)
7. Tire-related chemical responsible for salmon deaths in urban streams (2020) (111 points | 21 comments)
8. Appalachian Trail Hiker Photo Archive (43 points | 12 comments)
9. Dogs can remember names of toys years after not seeing them, study shows (187 points | 90 comments)
10. CitizenDJ – Make music using free audio and video from the Library of Congress (63 points | 4 comments)
11. Keyhole – Forge own Windows Store licenses (493 points | 241 comments)
12. The "email is authentication" pattern (117 points | 166 comments)
13. Things to know about the Great Wave (186 points | 60 comments)
14. Groups underpin modern math (38 points | 13 comments)
15. Beyond Ctrl-C: The dark corners of Unix signal handling (44 points | 11 comments)
16. An Optimization That's Impossible in Rust (5 points | 2 comments)
17. SQLToy (33 points | 2 comments)
18. Against Rereading (22 points | 16 comments)
19. Hallelujah, Leonard Cohen, and a Pulitzer Prize-winning writer's suicide (99 points | 56 comments)
20. A Post-Google World? (171 points | 106 comments)
21. How to wrap a C compiler and preprocessor, really (25 points | 1 comment)
22. The PERQ Computer (150 points | 80 comments)
23. Substack (YC W18) Is Hiring Machine Learning Engineers ( | hide)
24. Google says replacing C/C++ in firmware with Rust is easy (66 points | 38 comments)
25. Adding algebraic data types to Nickel (40 points | 10 comments)
26. Four Thieves Vinegar Collective – Harm Reduction for the Living (177 points | 137 comments)
27. The Beginnings of FM Radio Broadcasting (2018) (95 points | 16 comments)
28. Conservative GC can be faster than precise GC (125 points | 69 comments)
29. Jacquard lab notebook: Version control and provenance for empirical research (83 points | 21 comments)
30. Dance Choreography Notation (2017) (104 points | 22 comments)
